'''Adalgar Bolger''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Adalgar was the eldest child of [[Gundahar Bolger]] and [[Dina Diggle]]. He had three children: [[Rudigar Bolger|Rudigar]], [[Rudibert Bolger|Rudibert]] and [[Ruby Bolger|Ruby]].<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Adalgar'' is a Germanic name composed of the elements ''adal'' "noble" and ''gar, ger'' "spear".
